name: 3D-RPG
description:
*I couldn't get the WebGL to complete building without getting the multiple errors so unfortunately that won't be accessible and only the windows and mac builds will be available*

Click on the ground to move your character. You can attack enemies by clicking on them too. You can press the S button to save your progress and then press L to load it.

To move the camera press A to turn left, D to turn right, W to zoom in and S to zoom out.
